001
002import java.util.List;
003
004/**
005 * convert playlist
006 *
007 * @author matecsaba
008 */
009public class pls2m3u {
010
011    /**
012     * the main
013     *
014     * @param args arguments
015     */
016    public static void main(String[] args) {
017        if (args.length != 2) {
018            playerUtil.put("usage: pls2m3u <source.pls> <target.m3u>");
019            return;
020        }
021        playerUtil.put("reading " + args[0]);
022        playerLyric txt = playerUtil.readup(args[0]);
023        playerUtil.put("converting " + txt.size() + " lines");
024        List<playerSong> pls = playerSong.txt2pls(null, txt);
025        playerUtil.put("sorting " + pls.size() + " songs");
026        playerSong.sort(pls);
027        playerUtil.put("converting " + pls.size() + " songs");
028        txt = playerSong.m3u2txt(pls);
029        playerUtil.put("writing " + txt.size() + " lines to " + args[1]);
030        playerUtil.saveas(txt, args[1]);
031    }
032
033}
